text: Linda Varilis (née Henry; born 24 August 1959) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the roles of Yvonne Atkins in the ITV prison-based drama series Bad Girls (1999–2003), and Shirley Carter in the BBC One soap opera EastEnders (2006–present). She had previously appeared in EastEnders as the original Lorraine Salter (1991–1992). ==Early life== Henry was born and raised in Peckham, London. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from London Category:People from Peckham
title: Linda Henry
